ValidationRule.description: For Direct MN , Airscale Wifi Portfolio - Maintenance Type Or Years cant be Null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c , 'Airscale Wifi'), AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c , 'IP Routing'),ISPICKVAL( NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c , 'Fixed Network') ) ,Is_List_Price_Only__c = FALSE)), Quote_Type__c = 'Direct CPQ', ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Maintenance_Type__c, ''), NokiaCPQ_Quote_With_Maintenance_SSP_SRS__c = true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a value for the field - 'Maintenance Type'
